Module: kss/lib/kss_config

The kss/lib/kss_config module is normally accessed via the KssConfig() constructor of the kss module:

var kss = require('kss');
var kssConfig = new kss.KssConfig(data);
Source:
  • lib/kss_config.js, line 3

Methods

(private, inner) resolveArray(from, to) → {string|array}

Applies path.resolve() to the given path or array of paths.

Helper function for KssConfig.normalize().

Parameters:
Name Type Description
from string

Optional path to resolve the "to" path
to string | array

Relative path(s) to resolve.
Source:
  • lib/kss_config.js, line 309
Returns:

The absolute path(s).

Type
string | array
